feed.title: Jellystat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: 1.1.2 Release
entry.content:
This is the first of the new releases that will follow a different release cycle as compared to previous releases. Each release will be lighter overall to ensure fixes are deployed much faster to the stable branch

Whats New: Added environment variable to define the minimum number of seconds for a playback to be included - @zodac Added zh-CN Language - @zjjxwhh Added External URL option

Fixes Fixed Backup endpoints not working Fixed Device icons not showing for Emby Fixed filtering by stream type for Emby Fix for IS_JELLYFIN flag looking at the wrong section in the config fix for https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/issues/263 , default value for no activity on fs_user_stats

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: Release V1.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • History api add limit to query by @brikim in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/282
  • Split out Video and Audio into different columns. by @brikim in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/283
  • Clean up audio session card & Add translations for sessions by @brikim in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/286
  • Fix NaN showing up for audio only activity by @brikim in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/287
  • Update fr translation.json by @EVOTk in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/294
  • i18n: Add it-IT translation by @xRino94 in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/296
  • Update security.jsx by @ItsKiddow in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/290
  • Prototype implementation of activity timeline feature by @GrimJu in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/297

New Contributors

  • @brikim made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/282
  • @xRino94 made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/296
  • @ItsKiddow made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/290
  • @GrimJu made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/297

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/compare/1.1.2...1.1.3

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: Release version V1.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • backup fix hotfix by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/306
  • Update docker-compose.yml by @timolow in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/309
  • rebase compose file changes by @CyferShepard in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/310
  • Activity timeline fixes and improvements by @GrimJu in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/304
  • Added Catalan language by @gerardag in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/313
  • Error and warning fixes by @mcraig0602 in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/318
  • Emby Stream Type Fix and added IS_EMBY_API to README by @brikim in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/321
  • Add plural to timeline episode count by @GrimJu in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/325
  • Update fr translation.json by @EVOTk in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/326
  • allow configuring LISTEN_IP/enable IPv6 support by @FieldofClay in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/331
  • fix(docker-compose.yml): move logging configuration to individual services by @sususu98 in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/332

New Contributors

  • @timolow made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/309
  • @gerardag made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/313
  • @mcraig0602 made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/318
  • @FieldofClay made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/331

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/compare/1.1.3...1.1.4

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: Release Hotfix V1.1.5
entry.content: Hotfix to address stability issues in 1.1.4 Fixes Failures on sync Fix new Session Card css Fix DB failure in activity monitor Added tooltips to Session card truncated items

entry.title: New release for Jellystat: Release V1.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed Memory Leak
  • refactor: Use GET in /statistics API endpoints instead of POST by @Zlendy in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/376
  • feat: API endpoint /stats/getViewsByLibraryType by @Zlendy in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/378

New Contributors

  • @Zlendy made their first contribution in https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/pull/376

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CyferShepard/Jellystat/compare/1.1.5...1.1.6
